thread.title: Show Us Your Best Pet-In-Car Photos
thread.title_full: Show Us Your Best Pet-In-Car Photos

author: Kristen Lee
title: Show Us Your Best Pet-In-Car Photos

persons.name: patrick george  i am of the

text:
Go to permalink Photo credit: Patrick George 
I am of the opinion that if more animals had opposable thumbs, they’d be driving the cars. But, since more than likely they don’t, they just sit in the cars. And you know what? That’s perfectly fine! Advertisement 
Above, you can see Jalopnik Editor-in-Chief Patrick George’s boys. They are two very good boys. 
Here is a delightful corgi from Raphael Orlove. Photo credit: Raphael Orlove Photo credit: Jason Torchinsky 
These fine fellas belong to Jason Torchinsky. That’s Abby on the left and Oliver on the right. Photo credit: Tom McParland 
This is Petey, belonging to the McParland family. Photo credit: Kristen Lee 
And this is Nala. She belongs to my boyfriend’s family. GIF 
Now it’s your turn! Show me some of your pets in cars! I Ask, You Answer
